summary: This is an email from Paul Cassell to an undisclosed recipient, forwarding correspondence with Scotland Yard regarding their investigation into allegations related to the Epstein case. Cassell mentions being interviewed by Skype in early 2016 and notes the retirement of a Scotland Yard investigator after the case closed.

persons.name: Paul Cassell
persons.context: Author of the email, forwarding correspondence with Scotland Yard about their investigation into allegations; mentions being interviewed by Skype in early 2016.

events.title: Scotland Yard Skype interview
events.description: Scotland Yard interviewed Paul Cassell by Skype regarding allegations related to the Epstein case.

locations: Salt Lake City, UT 84112-0730 (University of Utah S.J. Quinney College of Law)
keyFacts: Paul Cassell forwarded correspondence with Scotland Yard regarding their investigation into allegations related to the Epstein case.
Scotland Yard interviewed Cassell by Skype in early 2016.
A Scotland Yard investigator retired shortly after the case closed, and Cassell worked with a woman investigator whose name he could not immediately recall.
